meta.name: description
meta.content: The Hubbard Independent School District is a dedicated partnership of schools, parents, and community members. Our purpose is to provide each student with quality learning opportunities that inspire personal growth and responsible citizenship in a positive and diverse environment.

div.div: Educating today for a Better Tomorrow
Time: 8 AM – 9 AM
Location: James Earl Rudder High School, 3251 Austins Colony Pkwy, Bryan, TX 77808, USA
Time: 7 PM – 8 PM
Location: Italy, TX 76651, USA
Time: 4:30 PM – 5:30 PM
Location: Coolidge, TX 76635, USA
I will be continuously updated you on issues that impact HISD. In an effort to plan and communicate with all stakeholders, I am releasing the following message...

In the interests of students, faculty, staff, and public safety, Hubbard ISD will be canceling school Through Friday April 3, 2020. The safety and welfare of our students, staff, and community is second to none.

Hubbard ISD leadership team will be meeting to address the needs of our students during this time. We will be addressing instruction at home, nutritional services, and individual/independent needs of our students over the next few days to develop a systemically appropriate plan. We will be communicating and updating you frequently through our webpage, social media, and tele-communicative system. We appreciate your patience and understanding at this time.
Our plan is to make a decision by April 1, 2020 to return to school Monday, April 6, 2020 or extend our cancellation.
Thank you,

Tim NormanSuperintendent
Hubbard I.S.D.
254-576-2564
Individual Senior Spotlight Everyone, please participate!

h3.a: COVID-19 Update from Governor Abbott’s Desk.

div.div: Executive Order to shut down ALL schools in the state of Texas from midnight, Friday, April 3rd through Friday, May 1st.
Supply Lists for 2019-2020
2019-2020 Hubbard ISD Calendar has been approved

At Hubbard ISD, we believe...That education is a collaborative effort of all stakeholders.
That students must take an active role in their own learning.
In shared decision-making.
That education is a lifelong journey supported by family and community.
That a student’s success is enhanced as parents and guardians actively support the educational process.
That education must be relevant to changing times.
That Hubbard ISD seeks to employ dedicated, positive, caring employees and educators.
The curriculum and in struction must meet the needs of an ever-changing world.
The appreciation of all employees of Hubbard ISD is an integral part of shaping students lives.
